    at your option, any later version.

You may only use cellml.recipe.api in compliance with one or more of
these licenses.  Please read the text of each of the above licenses
carefully as they all apply to this software.

Note that some parts of cellm.recipe.api links with third-party
libraries that are not licensed under one or more of the licenses as
listed above.  Such libraries may affect how certain parts of
cellml.recipe.api is licensed, which includes:

 1) zc.recipe.cmmi 
  * zc.recipe.cmmi is licensed under the Zope Public License, Version
    2.1, which has no restrictions on what license of the code that 
    links against it.
